title: Bloomberg Markets: VW Credit Said to Invest $30m in AutoGravity
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: VW Credit Said to Invest $30m in AutoGravity
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Erin Zlomek Editor Bloomberg News Discussing this week's venture capital deals news with Lily Katz, Bloomberg News Fintech Reporter, including VW Credit investing $30 million in auto lending sourcing company AutoGravity.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
